text: 25.24: FG 25.2-3; 25.7; 22.22Mbe Por ndiga mben han zɨgim, Festus khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu kha ŋgui vhɨrve gari guman pan Agripa, nde kha nza phorga ki gumgir vhɨrve, nde kha guma ganɨ. Mba Zudain ki gumgi gu mbigi, mbe za ana nzuav nzuav kama havharar khaŋ nzuai, ‘Ndu za ana shogɨrim, ana rimgi.’ Gu Zerusarem kim, mbe mba suambarara na mbuav kim, gu zav khaŋ zergim, mbe mbara na nzuai. Mbe khara na nzuai, ‘Nde mba guma shogirim, ana rimgiri. Nza ana kɨrgeŋ vuzvugi fhuvara.’
